radiographic_examinations.findings: atrial septal defect, patent ductus arteriosus, right atrial and right ventricular enlargement

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Color Doppler ultrasonography of the urinary system

radiographic_examinations.findings: grade II-IVH on the left side and moderate enlargement of bilateral lateral cerebral ventricles
significant increase in the size of both kidneys and signs of severe hydronephrosis in both kidneys
